metadata.title: CVE-2015-3448 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: REST client for Ruby (aka rest-client) before 1.7.3 logs usernames andpasswords, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information byreading the log.

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
